amendment.description: Amendment to the Goss amendment (A001) makes the lock-box provisions of the bill applicable to savings achieved in future fiscal years by requiring reductions in future year spending allocations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to the Goss amendment, to make the lock-box provisions of the bill applicable to savings achieved in future fiscal years by reductions in future year spending allocations.

action.text: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Harman to the Goss amendment (A001).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Harman amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
